snippet: Curt Perano, a New Zealander, was the first musher of the 69 in the field to begin the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race by crossing Willow Lake, about 50 miles north of Anchorage.
abstract: Curt Perano of New Zealand is first musher of 69 to begin the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race.
lead_paragraph: Curt Perano, a New Zealander, was the first musher of the 69 in the field to begin the Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race by crossing Willow Lake, about 50 miles north of Anchorage.
